00012 #ifndef PART_IS_H_
00013 #define PART_IS_H_

00015 #include <Camorra/Minkowski.h>

00020 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00021  * Standard initial state generator classes. Implementation are only provided  *
00022  * for 1- and 2-particle initial states, and the momenta are always created in *
00023  * the CM frame, with an effective invariant mass equal to the total invariant *
00024  * mass.                                                                       *
00025  *                                                                             *
00026  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00027 
00028 namespace Camorra
00029 {
00030     /* Standard 1-particle initial-state implementation: */
00031 
00032     template<class model_t>class partonic_is<model_t,1,Minkowski_type>: public initial_state<model_t,1>
00033     {
00034         /* Type definitions: */
00035 
00036         typedef initial_state<model_t,1> base_type;
00037 
00038         public:
00039 
00040             /* Type definitions: */
00041 
00042             typedef model_t model_type;
00043             typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00044             typedef typename base_type::momentum_type momentum_type;
00045             typedef typename base_type::spacetime_type spacetime_type;
00046             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00047 
00048             /* Static integer constants: */
00049             
00050             static const size_type k0=spacetime_type::timelike_direction;
00051             static const size_type kL=(model_type::beam_direction<0)?(-model_type::beam_direction):(model_type::beam_direction);
00052             static const int kL_sign=(model_type::beam_direction<0)?(-1):1;
00053 
00054             /* Public constructors */
00055             /*---------------------*/
00056 
00057             /* Default constructor. */
00058             
00059             partonic_is():base_type(false,false,true){}
00060 
00061             /* Constructor with beam energy. */
00062             
00063             partonic_is(const value_type* E_beam):base_type(base_type::make_vector(E_beam),false,false,true){}
00064 
00065             /* Copy constructor. */
00066 
00067             partonic_is(const partonic_is<model_t,1,Minkowski_type>& other):base_type(other){}
00068 
00069             /* Public modifiers */
00070             /*------------------*/
00071 
00072             /* Hadronic invariant mass refresher. */
00073 
00074             bool refresh_Ecm()
00075             {
00076                 return (this->set_Ecm(this->m(0)) and this->set_Ecm_hat(this->m(0)));
00077             }
00078 
00079             /* Generation implementation. Ignores any invariant mass generation
00080             in the output channel. */
00081 
00082             bool generate()
00083             {
00084                 if(!this->set_Ecm_hat(this->Ecm()))
00085                 {
00086                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00087                     return false;
00088                 }
00089                 momentum_type& p=this->p(0);
00090                 p.assign(0);
00091                 value_type M=this->m(0);
00092                 value_type E=this->beam_energy(0);
00093                 if(E==(value_type)0)
00094                 {
00095                     p[k0]=M;
00096                     this->weight()=(value_type)1;
00097                     return true;
00098                 }
00099                 p[k0]=E+M;
00100                 p[kL]=kL_sign*std::sqrt(E*(E+(value_type)2*M));
00101                 this->weight()=(value_type)1;
00102                 return true;
00103             }
00104 
00105             bool generate_p()
00106             {
00107                 momentum_type& p=this->p(0);
00108                 p.assign(0);
00109                 value_type M=this->m(0);
00110                 value_type E=this->beam_energy(0);
00111                 if(E==(value_type)0)
00112                 {
00113                     p[k0]=M;
00114                     this->weight()=(value_type)1;
00115                     return true;
00116                 }
00117                 p[k0]=E+M;
00118                 p[kL]=k0*std::sqrt(E*(E+(value_type)2*M));
00119                 this->weight()=(value_type)1;
00120                 return true;
00121             }
00122 
00123             /* Returns the flux factor. */
00124             
00125             value_type flux_factor() const
00126             {
00127                 return (value_type)0.5/this->m(0);
00128             }
00129 
00130             /* Weight evaluation method. */
00131 
00132             bool evaluate_weight()
00133             {
00134                 this->weight()=(value_type)1;
00135                 return true;
00136             }
00137 
00138             /* Public readout methods */
00139             /*------------------------*/
00140 
00141             /* Clone method implementation. */
00142 
00143             partonic_is<model_t,1,Minkowski_type>* clone() const
00144             {
00145                 return new partonic_is<model_t,1,Minkowski_type>(*this);
00146             }
00147 
00148             /* Serialisation: */
00149             /*----------------*/
00150 
00151             std::string type() const
00152             {
00153                 return "partonic";
00154             }
00155     };
00156     template<class model_t>const typename partonic_is<model_t,1,Minkowski_type>::size_type partonic_is<model_t,1,Minkowski_type>::k0;
00157     template<class model_t>const typename partonic_is<model_t,1,Minkowski_type>::size_type partonic_is<model_t,1,Minkowski_type>::kL;
00158     template<class model_t>const int partonic_is<model_t,1,Minkowski_type>::kL_sign;
00159 
00160     /* Standard 2-particle initial-state implementation. */
00161 
00162     template<class model_t>class partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>: public initial_state<model_t,2>
00163     {
00164         /* Type definition: */
00165 
00166         typedef initial_state<model_t,2> base_type;
00167 
00168         public:
00169 
00170             /* Type definitions: */
00171 
00172             typedef model_t model_type;
00173             typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00174             typedef typename base_type::momentum_type momentum_type;
00175             typedef typename base_type::spacetime_type spacetime_type;
00176             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00177 
00178             /* Static integer constants: */
00179             
00180             static const size_type k0=spacetime_type::timelike_direction;
00181             static const size_type kL=(model_type::beam_direction<0)?(-model_type::beam_direction):(model_type::beam_direction);
00182             static const int kL_sign=(model_type::beam_direction<0)?(-1):1;
00183 
00184             /* Public constructors */
00185             /*---------------------*/
00186 
00187             /* Constructor with no beam energies. */
00188             
00189             partonic_is():base_type(false,false,true){}
00190 
00191             /* Constructor with equal beam energies. */
00192             
00193             partonic_is(const value_type& E_beam):base_type(false,false,true)
00194             {
00195                 this->E_beams[0]=(value_type)0.5*E_beam;
00196                 this->E_beams[1]=(value_type)0.5*E_beam;
00197             }
00198 
00199             /* Constructor with distinguished beam energies. */
00200             
00201             partonic_is(const value_type& E_beam1,const value_type& E_beam2):base_type(false,false,true)
00202             {
00203                 this->E_beams[0]=E_beam1;
00204                 this->E_beams[1]=E_beam2;
00205             }
00206 
00207             /* Copy constructor. */
00208 
00209             partonic_is(const partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>& other):base_type(other){}
00210 
00211             /* Public modifiers */
00212             /*------------------*/
00213 
00214             /* Hadronic invariant mass refresher. */
00215 
00216             bool refresh_Ecm()
00217             {
00218                 value_type M1=this->m(0);
00219                 value_type M2=this->m(1);
00220                 value_type E1=this->beam_energy(0)+M1;
00221                 value_type E2=this->beam_energy(1)+M2;
00222                 value_type P1=std::sqrt(E1*E1-M1*M1);
00223                 value_type P2=std::sqrt(E2*E2-M2*M2);
00224                 return (this->set_s(M1*M1+M2*M2+(value_type)2*(E1*E2+P1*P2)) and this->set_Ecm_hat(this->Ecm()));
00225             }
00226 
00227             /* Generation implementation. */
00228 
00229             bool generate()
00230             {
00231                 if(!this->set_Ecm_hat(this->Ecm()))
00232                 {
00233                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00234                     return false;
00235                 }
00236                 this->p(0).assign(0);
00237                 this->p(1).assign(0);
00238                 value_type M1=this->m(0);
00239                 value_type M2=this->m(1);
00240                 value_type E1=this->beam_energy(0)+M1;
00241                 value_type E2=this->beam_energy(1)+M2;
00242                 value_type P1=std::sqrt(E1*E1-M1*M1);
00243                 value_type P2=std::sqrt(E2*E2-M2*M2);
00244                 this->p(0)[k0]=E1;
00245                 this->p(0)[kL]=kL_sign*P1;
00246                 this->p(1)[k0]=E2;
00247                 this->p(1)[kL]=-kL_sign*P2;
00248                 this->weight()=(value_type)1;
00249                 return true;
00250             }
00251 
00252             bool generate_p()
00253             {
00254                 this->p(0).assign(0);
00255                 this->p(1).assign(0);
00256                 value_type M1=this->m(0);
00257                 value_type M2=this->m(1);
00258                 value_type E1=this->beam_energy(0)+M1;
00259                 value_type E2=this->beam_energy(1)+M2;
00260                 value_type P1=std::sqrt(E1*E1-M1*M1);
00261                 value_type P2=std::sqrt(E2*E2-M2*M2);
00262                 this->p(0)[k0]=E1;
00263                 this->p(0)[kL]=kL_sign*P1;
00264                 this->p(1)[k0]=E2;
00265                 this->p(1)[kL]=-kL_sign*P2;
00266                 this->weight()=(value_type)1;
00267                 return true;
00268             }
00269 
00270             /* Returns the flux factor. */
00271             
00272             value_type flux_factor() const
00273             {
00274                 value_type E1=this->p(0)[k0];
00275                 value_type E2=this->p(1)[k0];
00276                 value_type P1=std::abs(this->p(0)[kL]);
00277                 value_type P2=std::abs(this->p(1)[kL]);
00278                 return (value_type)0.25/(E1*P2+E2*P1);
00279             }
00280 
00281             /* Weight evaluation method. */
00282 
00283             bool evaluate_weight()
00284             {
00285                 this->weight()=(value_type)1;
00286                 return true;
00287             }
00288 
00289             /* Public readout methods */
00290             /*------------------------*/
00291 
00292             /* Clone method implementation. */
00293 
00294             partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>* clone() const
00295             {
00296                 return new partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>(*this);
00297             }
00298 
00299             /* Serialisation: */
00300             /*----------------*/
00301 
00302             std::string type() const
00303             {
00304                 return "partonic";
00305             }
00306     };
00307     template<class model_t>const typename partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>::size_type partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>::k0;
00308     template<class model_t>const typename partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>::size_type partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>::kL;
00309     template<class model_t>const int partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>::kL_sign;
00310 }
00311 
00312 #endif /*PART_IS_H_*/
